_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five factors they possess [an3.57:14: The entire spectrum of an adept's ethics
The obstacles and barriers made by anyon: The giver is obstructed from making merit
The receiver is obstructed from getting what is offered
They've already broken and damaged themselves
The qualities of wise and esteemed sages: Faith in the Holy One with roots planted deep
Reach the realm of the gods or born in a good family
